Name: Quantity Qualifier
Notes: Code specifying the type of quantity

Name: Quantity
Remarks:
R0204: At least one of QTY-02 or QTY-04 is required
E0204: Only one of QTY-02 or QTY-04 may be present

Name: Unit or Basis for Measurement Code
Notes: Code specifying the units in which a value is being expressed, or manner in which a measurement has been taken

Name: Exponent
Notes: Power to which a unit is raised
Remarks: If C001-02 is not used, its value is to be interpreted as 1.

Name: Multiplier
Notes: Value to be used as a multiplier to obtain a new value
Remarks: If C001-03 is not used, its value is to be interpreted as 1.

Name: Free-Form Message
Remarks: QTY04 is used when the quantity is non-numeric.
